mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MovieDetails (movieCd, movieNm, movieNmEn, movieNmOg, prdtYear, showTm, openDt, prdtStatNm, typeNm, nationNm, genreNm) VALUES (#{movieCd}, #{movieNm}, #{movieNmEn}, #{movieNmOg}, #{prdtYear}, #{showTm}, #{openDt}, #{prdtStatNm}, #{typeNm}, #{nationNm}, #{genreNm})
INSERT INTO Actors (movieCd, peopleNm, peopleNmEn, castName, castEn) VALUES (#{movieCd}, #{peopleNm}, #{peopleNmEn}, #{castName}, #{castEn})
INSERT INTO Companies (movieCd, companyCd, companyNm, companyNmEn, companyPartNm) VALUES (#{movieCd}, #{companyCd}, #{companyNm}, #{companyNmEn}, #{companyPartNm})
INSERT INTO ShowTypes (movieCd, showTypeGroupNm, showTypeNm, auditNo, watchGradeNm) VALUES (#{movieCd}, #{showTypeGroupNm}, #{showTypeNm}, #{auditNo}, #{watchGradeNm})
INSERT INTO Staffs (movieCd, peopleNm, peopleNmEn, staffRoleNm) VALUES (#{movieCd}, #{peopleNm}, #{peopleNmEn}, #{staffRoleNm})
mapper.select: SELECT md.movieCd, md.movieNm, md.movieNmEn, md.movieNmOg, md.prdtYear, md.showTm, md.openDt, md.prdtStatNm, md.typeNm, md.nationNm, md.genreNm, a.peopleNm AS actorPeopleNm, a.peopleNmEn AS actorPeopleNmEn, a.castName, a.castEn, c.companyCd, c.companyNm, c.companyNmEn, c.companyPartNm, st.showTypeGroupNm, st.showTypeNm, st.auditNo, st.watchGradeNm, sf.peopleNm AS staffPeopleNm, sf.peopleNmEn AS staffPeopleNmEn, sf.staffRoleNm FROM MovieDetails md LEFT JOIN Actors a ON md.movieCd = a.movieCd LEFT JOIN Companies c ON md.movieCd = c.movieCd LEFT JOIN ShowTypes st ON md.movieCd = st.movieCd LEFT JOIN Staffs sf ON md.movieCd = sf.movieCd WHERE md.movieCd = #{movieCd}
